body:
"Now I'm not one to speak any of this ching chong inferior language, but I am one to bust a nut to anime girls. It's even better if their at the ripe age of below 18. Like a blooming tree before harvest their nectar is sweetest before matured. And like a blossoming flower they open up to the sensation of warmer winds just as their legs open up to the warm sensation of lustful juices."

-John Steinbeck, 1934
